attributes.action: To not back down on the EU referendum decision & continue to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit will be hard to start with but we will blossom and as other EU countries follow our lead we will be at the front leading the way to a brighter & better Europe with out all of the out dated concepts of it's current ruling.
attributes.background: If the 2nd Referendum goes ahead it will be a waste of time & money which should be spent on us leaving the EU. Even if we did vote to remain the EU will never take us seriously again and will make life much harder for the British people in the long term.
